flavor_text_entries.gold:
Its body can't be
harmed by any sort
of attack, so it is very eager to
make challenges
against enemies.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Extremely strong,
it can change the
landscape. It has an insolent nature
that makes it not
care about others.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
In just one of its
mighty hands, it
has the power to make the ground
shake and moun­
tains crumble.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
TYRANITAR is so overwhelmingly
powerful, it can bring down a whole
mountain to make its nest. This POKéMON wanders about in
mountains seeking new opponents to
fight.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
TYRANITAR is so overwhelmingly
powerful, it can bring down a whole
mountain to make its nest. This POKéMON wanders about in
mountains seeking new opponents to
fight.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A TYRANITAR is so overwhelmingly powerful,
it can bring down a whole mountain to make
its nest. It roams in mountains seeking
new opponents to fight.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of
attack, so it is very eager to make
challenges against enemies.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of
attack, so it is very eager to make
challenges against enemies.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
If it rampages, it knocks down
mountains and buries rivers. Maps
must be redrawn afterward.

mountains and buries rivers. Maps
must be redrawn afterward.

If it rampages, it knocks down

flavor_text_entries.black-2:
The quakes caused when it walks
make even great mountains crumble
and change the surrounding terrain.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
The quakes caused when it walks
make even great mountains crumble
and change the surrounding terrain.
flavor_text_entries.x:
In just one of its mighty hands, it has the power to
make the ground shake and mountains crumble.
flavor_text_entries.y:
If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries
rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a
whole mountain to make its nest. This Pokémon wanders about
in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a
whole mountain to make its nest. This Pokémon wanders about
in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
It wanders through the mountains seeking
opponents to fight. If it finds an opponent that’s
not worthy, Tyranitar ignores it and wanders on.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
This Pokémon is a mobile disaster, leaving
mountains crumbled and houses destroyed in
its wake.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of attack,
so it is very eager to make challenges
against enemies.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
The quakes caused when it walks make even
great mountains crumble and change
the surrounding terrain.
